abstract: A time value that describes the minimum frame duration of the video data.
overview:
## Discussion

Setting this property enables the output settings assistant to generate more complete video settings. After setting a value, requery the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVOutputSettingsAssistant/videoSettings] property to get the latest values.

If the source of the video data is an instance of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetReaderOutput], you can discover the minimum frame duration of your source asset using the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetTrack] instance’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetTrack/minFrameDuration] property.

The default value is `1/30`, which means the output settings assistant assumes that the source video has a maximum frame rate of 30fps.

# sourceVideoMinFrameDuration

**Instance Property**

A time value that describes the minimum frame duration of the video data.

## Declaration

```swift
var sourceVideoMinFrameDuration: CMTime { get set }
```

## Discussion

Setting this property enables the output settings assistant to generate more complete video settings. After setting a value, requery the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVOutputSettingsAssistant/videoSettings] property to get the latest values.

If the source of the video data is an instance of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetReaderOutput], you can discover the minimum frame duration of your source asset using the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetTrack] instance’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetTrack/minFrameDuration] property.

The default value is `1/30`, which means the output settings assistant assumes that the source video has a maximum frame rate of 30fps.

## Configuring output settings

- **outputFileType**: A uniform type identifier (UTI) that indicates the type of file to write.
- **audioSettings**: An audio settings dictionary.
- **sourceAudioFormat**: The format of the source audio data.
- **videoSettings**: A video settings dictionary.
- **sourceVideoFormat**: The format of the source video data.
- **sourceVideoAverageFrameDuration**: A time value that describes the average frame duration of the video data.
